Services: FieldHelper

FieldHelper

FieldHelper()

Various helper methods for functionality shared between formFor field directives.

Source:
  • services/field-helper.js, line 1

Methods

(static) this.manageFieldRegistration($scope, $attributes, formForController)

Helper method that registers a form field and stores the bindable object returned on the $scope. This method also unregisters the field on $scope $destroy.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
$scope $scope

Input field $scope
$attributes $attributes

Input field $attributes element
formForController Object

Controller object for parent formFor
Source:
  • services/field-helper.js, line 42

(static) this.manageLabel($scope, $attributes, humanizeValueAttribute)

Determines the field's label based on its current attributes and the FormForConfiguration configuration settings. Also watches for changes in the (attributes) label and updates $scope accordingly.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
$scope Hash

Directive link $scope
$attributes Hash

Directive link $attributes
humanizeValueAttribute Boolean

Fall back to a humanized version of the :value attribute if no label is provided; By default, a humanized version of the :attribute attribute will be used.
